tweets.text:
Planning a BBQ this #BankHoliday ? You can help protect the sea, lakes and rivers by  
never pouring fats and oils down the sink - leave them to cool and scrape them in the bin instead #ProtectOurEnvironment https://t.co/Tx7nya0mvR

Raw sewage discharging into the Old Lea from the flood relief channel. @thameswater - why? . Do you have no shame? @EnvAgency any chance of doing anything to stop this disgusting situation. @mayorofhackney - this is our town. https://t.co/Msg0ZgvpB2

We're looking forward to #Confluence21 ‚Äì 4 virtual events in the same week starting 8 June. 

We're showcasing what we've achieved with our partners eg the Natural Flood Management in #Calderdale work #NFM @Calderdale @slowtheflow_UK @HardcastleNT @nationaltrust @EnvAgencyYNE 
üëá https://t.co/Y3b3VCTNlj

Out of control. And the @EnvAgency openly say they don‚Äôt know how to fix it or when they can get control of it. Need emergency funding to help the poisoned people of Newcastle @UKParliament @HouseofCommons @BorisJohnson @MattHancock #stopthestink https://t.co/4kDlnRQRPw

tweets.text: @fayedavies @poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL Where I used to live is around the "T" of "The Westlands".  I know I can't do anything, but I really feel for you and can't understand why nothing seems to be being done #baffled

@poppers82 @HelenVi00175623 Also near the root of the red lines, it is absolutely horrific, started at 8pm like a wall of stench and still so so strong. The wind is supposedly in the other direction. @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @AaronBell4NUL enough really is enough. Either get us evacuated or sort it.

They all talk a good talk but that‚Äôs all it is no action at all we live in gas chambers it‚Äôs 2021 and we‚Äôre poisoned in our homes #StopTheStink #HumanRights @MattHancock @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA we just want fresh air in our homes

tweets.text:
@JasonManford  please can you help the community of Newcastle-under-Lyme by spreading the word has we are being gassed by a local Landfill site Walleys Quarry,Residents being to be prisoners in there own home cause of the stench
@Cap_it_off https://t.co/zS8U81gOue

The Affinity abstraction application required public consultation, the @EnvAgency did their best to hide this, in their consultation advert no mention of HS2. Despite the EAs best efforts fortunately the public did find this notice and asked some searching questions.

The @EnvAgencySE should be protecting our water supplies from the  destruction at the hands of projects such as #HS2 not hiding the damage being wrought.
#CheshamAndAmersham #VoterCulver https://t.co/c2bZgZIGSL

In the @AffinityWater application locations of the pumping stations were redacted. The @EnvAgency excuse ‚Äúcould compromise the security of public water supply assets‚Äù so building two HS2 tunnels through the aquifer does not compromise the security of public water supply??
There is more to follow on this compliant, complicit decision of the @EnvAgency to move abstraction volumes which facilitates HS2 polluting the aquifer.

Eventually @EnvAgency have approved the @AffinityWater application on 21 May 2021, almost 2 years, the EA will say this shows they looked into the details, we would argue that they put off making the decision until after they approved the HS2 tunnelling to avoid public debate.

July 2019 @AffinityWater concerned about the damage & pollution HS2 work to the aquifer they applied to @EnvAgency to move abstraction volumes from their impacted Blackford pumping station to the Grove, a location which was less at threat. The @EnvAgency have just approved this.

P Jennings:
The Affinity abstraction application required public consultation, the @EnvAgency did their best to hide this, in their consultation advert no mention of HS2. Despite the EAs best efforts fortunately the public did find this notice and asked some searching questions.

So, @EnvAgency can‚Äôt legally suspend operations at the toxic @RedIndustries2 landfill because it‚Äôs not the new waste that‚Äôs the problem (yet). But they have also reported 10 permit breaches this year https://t.co/XClLWJugXR, so surely that‚Äôs grounds for suspension? #stopthestink https://t.co/RD6b3Hg0jX https://t.co/6YcmBzhhQx

For those confusing the recycling guidelines...eyes wide üëÄü•∫ 

Lets #EndPlasticPollution https://t.co/Nl4PoMklHJ
@CertusCC Hi Ben, I can confirm that we're aware of this issue and we're working to get this resolved at the moment. The reference number for the job is 0041/82FMDT - Christy https://t.co/2BB3V8il5X
@BorisJohnson @MattHancock @ClareDinnisEA @pow_rebecca @PHE_uk @WHO @EnvAgencyMids @H_S_E @StinkStopthe https://t.co/O51gtFS5NJ
